entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No warnings are generated for Trimmed or SingleFile apps when SDD is not specified and rid is specified other than via commandline #25925
  • Task common files should support nullable enable #25920

Closed

  • exclude markdown changes from triggering a build in pipeline #25664
  • [dotnet 6] `dotnet test` does not allow passing `--arch` and `--results-directory` together #24728
  • build macOS (Arm64) Run: segmentation fault #25440

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the default to Release for Pack/Pub in command building #25926
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update dotnet-format to 7.0.330803 #25922
    Area-CodeFlow
  • fix(cli): handle sln folders in workload restore command #25919
    Area-Workloads
  • Update the RID target from lower Linux to the latest one #25909
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update man pages #25755
  • Exclude documentation changes from triggering builds #25842
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Follow-Up on compatibility tooling refactoring #25816
    Area-Compatibility
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #25899
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Explain the Purpose of Dogfood in The Dev Guide #25905
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25898
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Getting Aot HelloWorld to be warning free #25927
    Area-ILLink
  • Fix Description for Pre-Release Reinstallation Updates #25900
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure the Razor generator doesn't generate when it's suppressed #25833
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add --skip-sign-check option to repair, uninstall, and update #25834
    Area-Workloads
  • Patch 1 #21709
    Area-Compatibility
  • Adds default outputProperties Item #12030
